Restrictions: Must define values for short and long duration storage ('SDS','LDS')
Description: Parameters to attach to all storage objectes of that type
Hours of storage (ie. duration = storage capacity (GWh)/Power rating (GW))
Defines custom storage in the model
Year that existing capacity was built
First year that the storage can be expanded
Last year that the storage can be expanded
Absolute value that the storage can be expanded year year (GW)
Variable operational and maintenance cost of storage ($/MWh)
